messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] moving forward!!!
messages.msgSnippet: Nikki and Nanci that s so funny!!!    several mths ago I was on another list (not h-s ing) w/ my older sister and neither of us knew the other was on the list
messages.messageBody:
Nikki and Nanci that's so funny!!! several mths ago I was on another list
(not h-s'ing) w/ my older sister and
neither of us knew the other was on the list ... finally one day I got brave
and decided to post and sure enough, she posted right after me saying,
"Pris, WHY ARE YOU ONLINE IN THE MIDDLE OF THE MORNING AND WHY AREN'T YOU
BUSY TEACHING THOSE DEAR CHILDREN OF YOURS!!!" haha ... all I could say was,
***B~U~S~T~E~D*** and puleaze don't tell MOM!!! haha ...

Nikki meet Nanci ... Nanci meet Nikki <BGG> (big goofy grin)
Pris






----- Original Message -----
From: Nikki Norman <free4all@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 25, 2000 6:13 AM
Subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] moving forward!!!


>
>
> *lol* Yes it's me everybody, Nanci's niece. Thank you so much for
> announcing it Nanci :] Hey Nanci, if you say I'm beautiful, you're
> indirectly complimenting yourself. Everyone, and I mean everyone,
> (people I don't know but know you), say I look exactly like you. Go
> figure huh??:P I've been on this list for about 2 months or so.
>
> So...are you gonna tell me about how the adoption is going or what?? I
> would like to know if I'm gonna have anymore cousins:]
>

>indirectly complimenting yourself. Everyone, and I mean everyone,

Nanci K.

messages.msgSnippet: *lol* Yes it s me everybody, Nanci s niece. Thank you so much for announcing it Nanci :] Hey Nanci, if you say I m beautiful, you re indirectly complimenting
messages.messageBody:
*lol* Yes it's me everybody, Nanci's niece. Thank you so much for
announcing it Nanci :] Hey Nanci, if you say I'm beautiful, you're
indirectly complimenting yourself. Everyone, and I mean everyone,
(people I don't know but know you), say I look exactly like you. Go
figure huh??:P I've been on this list for about 2 months or so.

So...are you gonna tell me about how the adoption is going or what?? I
would like to know if I'm gonna have anymore cousins:]

Hey LOOK everybody!!! It's my beautiful niece! Kiss Kiss!!

Nanci K.

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] moving forward!!!
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/24/00 9:09:32 PM US Mountain Standard Time, ... $$$!!! Shoot...it s easy now that they ve both got floaties and ds can swim on his
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/24/00 9:09:32 PM US Mountain Standard Time,
x_t_sipr@... writes:

> ohhhhh, too cute Diane ... how in the world are you able to take two babies
> swimming @ the same time??? *ack*, you're brave :} when mine dch were
> tinsy, they were all over the pool, really gave ole mom a run for her
$$$!!!

Shoot...it's easy now that they've both got floaties and ds can "swim" on his
own...hard was before dd could sit up in the baby boat and I had to carry
both.

BUT it was OK, 'cause it was that or don't go.

:-) Diane

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] moving forward!!!
messages.msgSnippet: My little ones were so cute at the pool today. My little 2.5 yob swimming around, ALL BY MYSELF MOMMY, (yes yelling) and the 6 mog riding around in her baby
messages.messageBody:
My little ones were so cute at the pool today. My little 2.5 yob swimming
around, "ALL BY MYSELF MOMMY," (yes yelling) and the 6 mog riding around in
her baby boat tiring herself out kick, kick, kicking around.

I was wishing I had somewhere to post it.

Last week I was so impatient, but slept through my dh's days off and now am
back to having a wonderful time. Wonder why? <vbg>

:-) Diane

> NOW??? happy thoughts??? someone??? anyone??? lets rev this up a bit w/
> some FUN talk about our sweet kidlets or Buzz's *Z* recipes or does anyone
> have anything NEAT planned for the new week??? or WHO'Z PAINTED THEIR
NAILS
